Class Grid

  • java.lang.Object
    • classes.Grid
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.MouseListener, java.util.EventListener

    public class Grid
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.awt.event.MouseListener

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Grid.repaintTask
      Scheduled task (once per second) that performs the solve animation for every move in the solution list.
      class  Grid.snapChar
      Utility data structure for parseSnapshot method to keep track of which grid locations have been checked.
      class  Grid.TagColor
      Utility data structure to associate each board piece's tag with its color so pieces keep their color when moved by showHint or showSoln.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Grid(java.lang.String windowLabel)
      Constructor for this Grid; sets the text of the JFrame window, initalizes all buttons to blank, and calls function init().

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void countFiles()
      Counts the number of level files in the project directory.
      void create_menu()
      Creates the JMenu that contains buttons Exit, Help, About, Show Hint, Show Solution, and Reset Board
      void createColors()
      Manually sets the color palette from which button colors will be picked.
      void createRequiredButtons()
      Creates the game pieces from the locations listed in the level file and updates the locations in the grid.
      void endLevel(java.lang.String message, boolean nextLvl)
      Shows end-of-level popup dialog and advances the level to the next one if there are more level files remaining in the project directory.
      java.lang.String getSnapshot()
      Gets the snapshot of the current board.
      java.util.List<java.lang.String> getSolutionPath()
      Gets the shortest solution path from the algorithm in Solutions.
      void init()
      Reads level file and initializes the board to a playable state.
      void mouseClicked(java.awt.event.MouseEvent e)
      Mouse handler for all Buttons in the grid.
      void mouseEntered(java.awt.event.MouseEvent e)
      Required function stub for MouseListener.
      void mouseExited(java.awt.event.MouseEvent e)
      Required function stub for MouseListener.
      void mousePressed(java.awt.event.MouseEvent e)
      Required function stub for MouseListener.
      void mouseReleased(java.awt.event.MouseEvent e)
      Required function stub for MouseListener.
      java.util.List<java.lang.String> parseSnapshot(java.lang.String s)
      Takes a single-line snapshot string and parses individual button locations from the snapshot's grid.
      void performMove(int destI, int destJ)
      Moves the selected button to the indicated location (destI, destJ).
      void printGrid()
      Utility function to print out grid values.
      void readFile()
      Reads the current level file and parses the locations for all the game pieces.
      void selectButton(Button b, boolean val)
      Selects the indicated button and adjacent tiles that belong to the same piece.
      void showHint()
      Gets the shortest solution path and performs the first move in the resulting list of moves.
      void showSoln()
      Gets the shortest solution path and performs all the moves in the resulting list of moves by starting a TimerTask that performs one move per second.
